original: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa /
analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa /
translated: Monks who are overseers of the renunciant’s requisites

original: chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni /🔽ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
analyzed: chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ni / ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya la /
translated: who have these five qualities🔽should be appointed even if they have not been nominated.

original: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o //

original: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsko bar bya ste /

original: je dang por spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: je dang por spro bar bya ste /

analyzed: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi spong ba ba'i zhal ta byed par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o //

analyzed: gal te spro na des spro zhes brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i 'og tu des gnas mal bshams pa byas nas /

original: gandi brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo ba nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la /
analyzed: gandi brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo ba nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur la /

original: dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro na /
translated: This monk so-and-so is willing to be the saṅgha’s manager of the retreat.

analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko ste /
translated: then may the saṅgha please agree to appoint this monk so-and-so as the saṅgha’s manager of the retreat.

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid do //

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //

analyzed: las ni 'di ltar bya ste /

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di @189b dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par spro ste /

analyzed: de'i slad du dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bsko zhing /

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid na /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /

original: dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid par bskos shing /

original: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
translated: The monk named so-and-so

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi spong ba'i zhal ta bgyid de /
translated: is the attendant who will prepare the place for the confession ceremony.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
translated: Since you are silent, I will take it that you agree.

analyzed: dge slong dag ngas dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos rnams bca' bar bya ste /

original: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas /
analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas /
translated: The monk who is the attendant who prepares the place for the confession ceremony

original: spong khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: spong khang du chag chag gdab par bya'o //
translated: should sprinkle water on the floor of the place for the confession ceremony.

original: phyag dar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag dar bya'o //
translated: He should sweep it.

original: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o //
analyzed: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o //

original: stan bsham par bya'o //
analyzed: stan bsham par bya'o //

analyzed: bshang ba'i sa dang / gci ba'i sa byi dor bya'o //
translated: He should clean the place for defecating and the place for urinating.🔽He should sprinkle water on them.

original: chag chag gdab bar bya'o //🔽phyag dar bya'o //
analyzed: chag chag gdab bar bya'o // phyag dar bya'o //
translated: He should sweep them.

original: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o //
analyzed: lci ba sar pa'i byug pas bsku bar bya'o //
translated: He should smear them with cow dung.

original: lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: lo ma'i chang bu gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should set out a supply of leaves.

original: bong rdog dang sa dang chu gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bong rdog dang sa dang chu gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should set out a supply of clods of earth and water.

original: de dag re re'i @190a *//🔽gan du song ste /
analyzed: de dag re re'i @190a *// gan du song ste /
translated: He should go to each of them

original: 'bod par byed nas /
analyzed: 'bod par byed nas /
translated: and call out,🔽“Hey, you there!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: re re nas bod par mi bya bar gand'i brdung bar bya'o //
analyzed: re re nas bod par mi bya bar gand'i brdung bar bya'o //
translated: “You should not beat the gaṇḍī for each one. You should beat it for all of them.”

original: de gand'i rgya cher brdungs ba dang / ji tsam na spyod yul gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pha ma 'ongs sam zhe sdangs nas /
analyzed: de gand'i rgya cher brdungs ba dang / ji tsam na spyod yul gyi grong mi rnams chom rkun pha ma 'ongs sam zhe sdangs nas /
translated: When they beat the gaṇḍī for all of them, the people of the village in which they were staying thought, “Have thieves come?”

original: de rnams go bgos te lhags nas /
analyzed: de rnams go bgos te lhags nas /
translated: They put on their armor and came.

original: 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag ci chom rkun pa dag mchis sam /
translated: “Noble ones, have thieves come?”

original: de rnams kyis smras pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyis smras pa /
translated: They said,

original: shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag ma lhags te /
analyzed: shes ldan dag chom rkun pa dag ma lhags te /
translated: “Sirs, no thieves have come.

original: 'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar spong ba la tron byed do //
translated: We are guarding the monastery.”

original: de rnams kyis smras pa /
analyzed: de rnams kyis smras pa /
translated: They said,

original: 'phags pa dag rnam par 'tshe ba la tron mdzad kyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag rnam par 'tshe ba la tron mdzad kyi /
translated: “Noble ones, you are guarding against harm.

original: 'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de /
analyzed: 'di na spong ba ga la mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de /
translated: Where is there a monastery here?”

original: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said,

original: gand'i rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: gand'i rgya cher brdung bar mi bya ste /
translated: “You should not beat the gaṇḍī for all of them.

original: 'di ltar gand'i ni lnga ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gand'i ni lnga ste /

original: dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gand'i dang / las kyi gand'i dang / shi ba'i gand'i dang / spong ba'i gand'i dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gand'i'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gand'i dang / las kyi gand'i dang / shi ba'i gand'i dang / spong ba'i gand'i dang / gnod pa byung ba'i gand'i'o //
translated: The key points for gathering the Saṅgha, the key points for activities, the key points for death, the key points for abandoning, and the key points for when harm arises.

analyzed: de la dge 'dun bsdu ba'i gand'i ni rgyud gsum dang tog gsum pa'o //

original: las kyi gand'i ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo //
analyzed: las kyi gand'i ni rgyud gcig dang tog gsum mo //
translated: The key points for activities are the single continuum and the three topics.

original: shi ba'i gand'i ni byi ba'o //
analyzed: shi ba'i gand'i ni byi ba'o //
translated: The key points for death are the mouse.

original: spong ba'i gand'i ni 'khar gsil lo //
analyzed: spong ba'i gand'i ni 'khar gsil lo //

original: gnod pa byung ba'i gand'i ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o //
analyzed: gnod pa byung ba'i gand'i ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o //
translated: The key points for when harm arises are the amount that is sufficient.

original: de dag dus gting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas /
analyzed: de dag dus gting la thug pa na ci bder byed nas /
translated: When they reached the end of the time, they did whatever they liked.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: gting la thug pa na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas ci bder byas te /
analyzed: gting la thug pa na ci bder mi bya bar dus shes par byas nas ci bder byas te /

analyzed: dge 'dun las tshal ma 'thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang khrus byas nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'du khom pa dang / bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rkang lag gnyis bkrus nas /
translated: Those who have not yet received the forest-dwellers’ practice should wash and then enter the saṅgha.

analyzed: grong @190b du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom par bya'o //

analyzed: de dag de kho na bzhin du ci bder byed nas /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /

analyzed: de kho na bzhin du ci bder mi bya bar rgyud chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: ha cang mang du gdon par mi bya'o //
translated: “You should not recite it too much.

original: de dag ha cang nyung dur 'don par byed nas /
analyzed: de dag ha cang nyung dur 'don par byed nas /
translated: ” They recited it too little.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: ha cang nyung dur gdon par mi bya ste /
analyzed: ha cang nyung dur gdon par mi bya ste /
translated: “You should not recite it too little.

original: 'di ltar rin par gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar rin par gdon par bya'o //
translated: You should recite it like this.

original: de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas /
analyzed: de dag yon bshad par mi byed nas /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: yon bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yon bshad par bya'o //
translated: “The merit should be explained.”

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad par bya'o zhes bkang stsal nas /
translated: When the Blessed One said, “The merit should be explained,”

analyzed: de dag gis sus yon bshad par bya ba mi shes nas /
translated: they did not know who should explain the merit.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad par bya'o //
translated: “The most senior monk in the saṅgha should explain the merit.”

analyzed: de dag yon bshad pa ha cang mang du byed nas /
translated: They explained the merit too much.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bya'o //
analyzed: yon bshad pa ha cang mang du mi bya'o //
translated: “You should not explain the merit too much.”

original: de dag yon bshad pa ha cang nyung dur byed nas /
analyzed: de dag yon bshad pa ha cang nyung dur byed nas /
translated: They explained the merit too little.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: yon bshad pa ha cang nyung dur mi bya ste /
analyzed: yon bshad pa ha cang nyung dur mi bya ste /
translated: “You should not explain the merit too little.

original: 'di ltar yon bshad pa ran par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar yon bshad pa ran par bya'o //
translated: You should explain the merit appropriately.”

analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'du zhing /
translated: All the monks who were in charge of the renunciants gathered at the end

analyzed: thams cad kyi mdun du 'gyes par byed nas /
translated: and dispersed at the beginning.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Monks, you should not gather at the end🔽and disperse at the beginning.

analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pa thams cad kyi mjug tu 'gyes par bya zhing /

original: thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi mdun du 'du bar bya'o //
translated: and he should assemble them at the beginning of all the duties.

original: gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na /
analyzed: gal te rkyen de lta bu byung na /
translated: If such conditions arise,

analyzed: des phyogs dben par lde mig sbas te / tshe dang ldan pa kho bos phyogs ga ge mo @191a *//

analyzed: zhig tu lde mig sbas kyis phye la zhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: and say, “Venerable, I have hidden the key in such-and-such a place. Open it and enter.”

analyzed: dge slong spong ba'i zhal ta byed pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te mi 'jug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the monk who is the manager of renunciates does not correctly take up and practice the rules for the conduct of renunciates as they have been laid down, he commits an offense.

original: de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni 'dug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “staying.”

original: bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is to be done?”

analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa 'di ni bya ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the Sangha’s request, the request and two, and the request and four karmas. This is called “what is to be done.”

analyzed: gso sbyong gang zhe na /

analyzed: dge slong dag ngas so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gang yin pa ste /

analyzed: de khyed kyis deng phyin chad zla ba phyed phyed cing gdon par bya'o //
translated: You should recite it every half-month from now on.”

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, “You should recite the Sūtra on the Prātimokṣa every half-month.”

original: zhes bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: zhes bka' stsal nas /
translated: After he had said this,
